publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3217 Margaret Jamieson: Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadershipâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team which consists of officers from Ayrshire & Arran Primary Care NHS Trust, East Ayrshire Council and Strathclyde Police on achieving the Office for Public Management 2002 prize for Public Management Leadership, and looks forward to the roll-out across Scotland of this partnership template for providing one-stop public facilities.

S1M-3217 Margaret Jamieson: Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership-That the Parliament congratulates the Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team which consists of officers from Ayrshire & Arran Primary Care NHS Trust, East Ayrshire Council and Strathclyde Police on achieving the Office for Public Management 2002 prize for Public Management Leadership, and looks forward to the roll-out across Scotland of this partnership template for providing one stop public facilities.
S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Phil Gallie*

S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Rhoda Grant*, Mr John McAllion*, Sarah Boyack*, Karen Gillon*, Scott Barrie*, Jackie Baillie*, Bill Butler*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Margaret Smith*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Angus MacKay*, Ms Wendy Alexander*
S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Janis Hughes*
S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Susan Deacon*
S1M-3217 Dalmellington Area Centre Project Management Team and the 2002 Prize for Public Management Leadership (lodged on 13 June 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*
